items.title: Curiosity
items.description: - Information Noise Based upon N.N. Taleb, where more information will act as noise and disturb the signals.

items.title: The Quants
items.description: This is a history book of people who revolutionized finance with math, game theory, and computers to model how the market work. However, the real world is not a model, and quants are also humans, as the financial crisis showed.
